name: expo-notification-service-extension-plugin
description: Expo plugin that expects a notification service extension file as an input and copies it to XCode binaries

scripts.build: npm run lint && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build', {recursive: true, force: true})" && tsc && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('support/serviceExtensionFiles', 'build/support/serviceExtensionFiles', {recursive: true})"

author: nikwebr
